title: Antioxidant polyphenolic extract from Rosa cymosa Tratt alleviates the inflammatory response in RAW264.7 macrophages via regulating NF-κB pathway and cell autophagy.
abstract: Rosa cymosa Tratt is a traditional Chinese medicine with long history of medicinal use. The fruit of R. cymosa, which named as 'Xiao Jin Ying Zi, has been documented has the function of treatment of contusions, injuries, and wind-phlegm cough.
